typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		id as string,
		name as string,
		depid as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source(output(
		depid as string,
		name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source2
source1 filter(depid=='1') ~> Filter1
Filter1 derive(name = initCap(name)) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1, source2 join(source1@depid == source2@depid,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		id,
		name = DerivedColumn1@name,
		depname = source2@name
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1
